mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE HH_BANK_CARD ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , ENABLED CHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y' CHECK (ENABLED IN ('Y', 'N')) , BC CHAR(1) CHECK(BC IN ('B', 'C', 'O')) , NAME TEXT(32) NOT NULL , DSCR TEXT(128) DEFAULT NULL )
CREATE TABLE HH_BANK_KIND ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , NAME TEXT(32) NOT NULL , BEAN_NAME TEXT(32) DEFAULT NULL )
CREATE TABLE HH_CARD_KIND ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , NAME TEXT(32) NOT NULL , BEAN_NAME TEXT(32) DEFAULT NULL )

CREATE TABLE HH_BANK ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , CARD_BANK_CARD_NO INTEGER DEFAULT -1 , ENABLED CHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y' CHECK (ENABLED IN ('Y', 'N')) , BANK_KIND NUMBER DEFAULT NULL , BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE CHAR(1) DEFAULT NULL CHECK (BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE IN ('O', 'T', 'R', 'F')) , BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER TEXT(16) DEFAULT NULL , MATURITY DATE DEFAULT NULL , RATE REAL DEFAULT NULL , FOREIGN KEY(CARD_BANK_CARD_NO) REFERENCES HH_BANK_CARD(NO) , FOREIGN KEY(BANK_KIND) REFERENCES HH_BANK_KIND(NO) )

CREATE TABLE HH_CARD ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , CARD_BANK_CARD_NO INTEGER DEFAULT -1 , ENABLED CHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y' CHECK (ENABLED IN ('Y', 'N')) , CARD_KIND TEXT(16) DEFAULT NULL , CARD_WITHDRAWAL_DATE INTEGER DEFAULT 0 , CARD_WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CARD_NO INTEGER DEFAULT 0 , FOREIGN KEY(CARD_BANK_CARD_NO) REFERENCES HH_BANK_CARD(NO) , FOREIGN KEY(CARD_WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CARD_NO) REFERENCES HH_BANK_CARD(NO) , FOREIGN KEY(CARD_KIND) REFERENCES HH_CARD_KIND(NO) )

CREATE TABLE HH_CARD_ITEM ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , CARD_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , ENABLED CHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y' CHECK (ENABLED IN ('Y', 'N')) , NAME TEXT(64) NOT NULL , CARD_NUMBER TEXT(64) DEFAULT NULL , CARD_TYPE CHAR(1) DEFAULT NULL CHECK (CARD_TYPE IN ('C', 'H', 'P', 'G', 'I', 'O')) , DSCR TEXT(128) DEFAULT NULL , FILE_CARD_NAME TEXT(32) DEFAULT NULL , FILE_CARD_NUMBER TEXT(32) DEFAULT NULL , FOREIGN KEY(CARD_NO) REFERENCES HH_CARD(NO) )
